english: poetic name for Xiang River region

etymology.description: 瀟(瀟) (xiāo, "clear") refers to the clear water or surroundings; 湘(湘) (xiāng, "Xiang River") is the name of a well-known river in Hunan province.
etymology.interpretation: The term 瀟湘(瀟湘) (xiāoxiāng) evokes the natural beauty and clear waters of the Xiang River region, a place historically revered in Chinese poetry and known for inspiring many literary works.

examples.chinese: 我喜爱潇湘(瀟湘)，那里的山水充满诗意(那裡的山水充滿詩意)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐ'ài Xiāoxiāng(瀟湘)，nàlǐ de shānshuǐ chōngmǎn shīyì(那裡的山水充滿詩意)。
examples.english: I cherish Xiāoxiāng, where the landscapes brim with poetic charm.

examples.chinese: 雨后潇湘(瀟湘)，雾气缭绕(霧氣繚繞)。
examples.pinyin: Yǔhòu Xiāoxiāng(瀟湘)，wùqì liǎorào(霧氣繚繞)。
examples.english: After the rain, Xiāoxiāng is enveloped in swirling mist.

examples.chinese: 潇湘水畔寻梦(瀟湘水畔尋夢)。
examples.pinyin: Xiāoxiāng shuǐpàn xún mèng(瀟湘水畔尋夢)。
examples.english: Dreams are sought along the riverside of Xiāoxiāng.
